oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-10-15 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 15, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performers Bill Carlisle and the Carlisles, and regular performers Minnie Pearl, Don Slayman, Del Wood, Rod Brasfield, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Del Wood; Rod Brasfield; Bill Carlisle; Carlisles; Grandpa Jones; George Morgan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Rocky Mountain Express (Del Wood) [continued from part 1] -- George Morgan introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces Bill Carlisle and the Carlisles -- On My Way To The Show (Bill Carlisle and the Carlisles) -- George Morgan introduces Grandpa Jones -- Night Train To Memphis (Grandpa Jones) -- Announcement of next week's National Safety Congress in Chicago (Grant Turner) -- George Morgan talks -- Lonesome Record (George Morgan) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (George Morgan) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Brasfield, Rod; Wood, Del; Minnie Pearl; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Davis, Don, 1928 December 22-; Slayman, Don (Musician); Carlisle, Bill; Carlisles (Musical group)
